SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.view

Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.view.GameScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameModelObserver, Screen
public class GameScreen extends Object implements Screen, GameModelObserver
Represents the main game screen where the game is displayed. Implements the Screen interface and GameModelObserver. Responsible for initializing and managing the game's UI components, background, and camera follow behavior.
